top_comments.comment: Uwaaaaah!! So adorable! I love it! Your hard work as paid off! The hamster hug was also so so so cuteee! I died to adorableness haha, I love the sound effects, the games, the ideas, and the everything! Stay safe to you and your hamsters! (PS: I'm definitely not trying to get a hamster now- haha)
That looked kinda rough at times…
I love these hamster, love the creativity, i Will support you!
So cute! I can’t imagine how long it takes to make the sets! Love your channel 💕

comments_since_last_sample.body:
This is so awesome, cool and fun to watch!! I understand that it must be really hard to actually get your hamster inside of this challenging obstacle course, but you do it all for our entertainment and I love it very much!! I hope you get 3 billion subscribers!! ❤️❤️

I love it so much, it’s so cute seeing the curious hamster work their way to find their hamster buddy. And in the end, I know that they are probably rewarded with a good night’s rest and snack time! Have a great day!! ❤️‍🔥❤️‍🔥

And I don’t think anyone realizes how much effort you or your team puts into making these incredible hamster mazes!! Like what?? This looks so awesome. 🤗🤗😎🤯😱
I love these hamster, love the creativity, i Will support you!
So cute! I can’t imagine how long it takes to make the sets! Love your channel 💕
